name: Butterfly Effect (G4M3F4C3)
description:
This is the first game that I have ever made and uploaded. Made for the Brackey's Game Jam. Any feedback would be appreciated, and post your scores in the comments!

Controls:

Right Click - Move to location

Left Click - Possess / Attack

R - Gather followers / Explode

E - Eject

W - Toggle gathering

Escape - Stop the game and return to main menu

How to Play:

You are a little butterfly, whose goal is to cause as much chaos and destruction in the city as possible in 2 minutes. As the butterfly, you can right click to move around and left click on people or cars to possess them. Once possessed, you can attack people by left clicking on them. You can also press R to gather followers and make large fights and riots in the city, or if possessing a car, it will explode! Press W to toggle whether your followers should move towards you or do their own thing, and E to stop possessing the current character. You can also destroy things by running into them at a high enough speed.

The object of the game is to cause as much violence and destruction as possible in a limited amount of time, and try to get the highest score you can.
